Beacons Have Arrived!

February 1, 2013 . . Comments
Tags:

Tweet

The holiday season is over but there are still presents being opened at Sonic Notify.  We just received 2,000 pristine new beacons that are ready to emit the Sonic signal and you can purchase yours today for just $15! 

The beacons come in two different styles, AC Beacons and Battery Beacons.  The AC Beacons plug into any outlet and provide a 15’ range of the inaudible Sonic signal.  These are perfect for retail locations, store aisles, or anywhere else that has an outlet.  The Battery Beacons project the signal at the same range as the AC Beacons, but give you the ability to connect with users on the move.  If you are at a conference and want to transfer content to people that come near you, just stick a Battery Beacon in your pocket and let the Sonic signal do the rest.  If you want to put a beacon in a place that has no outlets like a bus stop, the Battery Beacon will satisfy all your needs.  Log onto sonicnotify.com to sign up for a plan, then head to the Sonic Store to purchase your hardware.
